<installation version="1.0">
<!-- The info section. The meaning of the tags should be natural ... --> <info> <appname>caArray</appname> <appversion>@{caarray.version}</appversion> <authors> <author name="NCI" email=""/> </authors> <url>http://www.cancer.org/</url> <javaversion>1.5</javaversion> <uninstaller write="no"/> <writeinstallationinformation>no</writeinstallationinformation> </info>
<!-- The gui preferences indication. Sets the installer window to 640x480. It will not be able to change the size. --> <guiprefs width="1028" height="768" resizable="yes"> <modifier key="useButtonIcons" value="no"/> <modifier key="useLabelIcons" value="no"/> <modifier key="allYGap" value="3"/> <modifier key="layoutAnchor" value="NORTHWEST"/> <modifier key="useHeadingPanel" value="yes"/> <modifier key="headingLineCount" value="1"/> <modifier key="headingFontSize" value="1.5"/> <modifier key="headingBackgroundColor" value="0x00ffffff"/> <modifier key="headingPanelCounter" value="text"/> <modifier key="headingPanelCounterPos" value="inHeading"/> </guiprefs>
<!-- Need to define ant properties we want to use during install as variables --> <variables> <variable name="installer.dir" value="@{installer.dir}"/> <variable name="installer.properties.wiki.page" value="@{installer.properties.wiki.page}"/> <variable name="upgrade.properties.wiki.page" value="@{upgrade.properties.wiki.page}"/> <variable name="mergeDuplicateBiomaterialsMigrator.renameHybridizations" value=""/> </variables>
<!-- dynamic variables to determine which target to call --> <dynamicvariables> <variable name="build.file.target" value="install" condition="install" /> <variable name="properties.file.target" value="$SYSTEM_user_home/${installer.dir}/caarray_installer/install.properties" condition="install" /> <variable name="application.base.path.target" value="$UserPathPanelVariable" condition="install" /> <variable name="build.file.target" value="upgrade" condition="upgrade" /> <variable name="properties.file.target" value="$SYSTEM_user_home/${installer.dir}/caarray_installer/upgrade.properties" condition="upgrade" /> <variable name="application.base.path.target" value="${existing.installation.home}" condition="upgrade" /> </dynamicvariables>
<!-- The locale section. Asks here to include the English and French langpacks. --> <locale> <langpack iso3="eng"> <str id="AntAction.core" txt="Proceeding of ANT-activities"/> <str id="AntAction.install" txt="Revision of archives"/> </langpack> </locale>
<conditions> <condition type="variable" id="install"> <name>setup.type</name> <value>install</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="upgrade"> <name>setup.type</name> <value>upgrade</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="should.show.duplicate.hybridization.details.panel.condition"> <name>should.show.duplicate.hybridization.details.panel.variable.name</name> <value>true</value> </condition> <condition type="java" id="installonwindows"> <java> type="ref" refid="install"/> <condition type="ref" refid="installonwindows" /> </condition> <condition type="and" id="upgrade.onwindows"> <condition type="ref" refid="upgrade"/> <condition type="ref" refid="installonwindows" /> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="cas.install"> <name>single.sign.on.install</name> <value>true</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="non.cas.install"> <name>single.sign.on.install</name> <value>false</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="ldap.setup"> <name>ldap.authentication.enabled</name> <value>true</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="custom.installation.type"> <name>install.type</name> <value>custom</value> </condition> <condition type="and" id="custom.installation"> <condition <condition type="or" id="custom_installation_or_upgrade"> <condition type="ref" refid="custom.installation"/> <condition type="ref" refid="upgrade" /> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="fileDataEngine.file-system"> <name>dataStorage.fileDataEngine</name> <value>file-system</value> </condition> <condition type="variable" id="parsedDataEngine.file-system"> <condition type="ref" refid="parsedDataEngine.file-system" /> </condition> <condition type="and" id="cas_settings.panel"> <condition type="ref" refid="custom_installation_or_upgrade"/> <condition type="ref" refid="cas.install" /> </condition> <condition type="and" id="db_or_ldap.panel"> <condition type="ref" refid="custom_installation_or_upgrade"/> <condition type="ref" refid="non.cas.install" /> </condition> </conditions>

<listeners> <listener installer="SummaryLoggerInstallerListener"> <os family="windows"/> </listener>
<listener installer="AntActionInstallerListener" uninstaller="AntActionUninstallerListener" /> </listeners>
<!-- The packs section. We specify here our packs. --> <packs> <pack name="download_install" id="download_install" required="no" installGroups="caarray"> <description>The base files</description> <file src="@{dist.location}/@{install.zip.file}" targetdir="$SYSTEM_user_home/@{installer.dir}"/> <file src="@{this.dir}/build.xml" targetdir="$SYSTEM_user_home/@{installer.dir}"/> <file src="@{this.dir}/property-template" defaultexcludes="yes" targetdir="$SYSTEM_user_home/@{installer.dir}"/> </pack>

<pack name="parse-update" required="no" preselected="no" installGroups="caarray"> <description>parse the input values</description> <parsable targetfile="$SYSTEM_user_home/@{installer.dir}/@{application_installer}/upgrade.properties" type="plain" /> </pack>
<pack name="convert-install-path" required="no" preselected="no" installGroups="caarray"> <description>installation base path</description> </pack>
<pack name="install-application" required="no" preselected="no" installGroups="caarray"> <description>install the application</description> </pack>
